website_summaries.verdict: The GE X2600 is a bargain-priced superzoom camera, but its image quality suffers as you increase the ISO and it lacks an EVF.
cons: Poor image quality at medium ISO settings

customer_reviews.title: This is a truly terrible camera and I would not suggest it for anyone
customer_reviews.text: This is a truly terrible camera and I would not suggest it for anyone, even someone with a very low budget. I have had so many cameras that are SO MUCH BETTER in terms of quality. The Kodak Easyshare puts this to shame, as did a little $70 Olympus point and click I once had. The look of it implies it will provide a more professional image, but that's just smoke and mirrors marketing. This camera SUCKS. I should have known to not buy a camera from GE! These days, I actually prefer to use my cell over this, which says a lot about what a piece of junk it is.
customer_reviews.author: Mandeville Mama

customer_reviews.title: Really amazing camera, has a ton of features and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Really amazing camera, has a ton of features and the optical lens is unreal, you can get some really nice close ups and still be standing far away. Need to get a memory card for real picture taking as the internal memory is only 32mbs. Nowhere in the manual did it mention what the internal memory, once I hooked it up to the computer is how I found out. If you accidentally leave the lens cap on the camera tells you to remove it so you don't have pictures of it. All around great camera for the money, comparable cameras with this optical lens are upwards of $200, so the price on this camera is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Jayson

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this camera - while it lasted. Bought it just before taking back to back cruises. It took great pictures, and the zoom was a huge step up from anything I'd used before. Unfortunately, after a just 7 days and about 3200 pictures, the camera started giving an error message about the lens being stuck, and turning itself off. Various solutions found online were unable to remedy the problem. I feel like I got my moneys worth as far as it goes, but it was very disappointing that it didn't last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Russell D. Humphress

customer_reviews.title: Jaw-dropping
customer_reviews.text: This is a jaw-dropping piece of modern technology. I am more than happy with the extra features that I shall hardly use because I do photoshopping off site. As to the 26x zoom... I no longer bother with a pair of binocular to do my bird-watching.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Nodopaka

customer_reviews.title: R
customer_reviews.text: We had this awesome camera 3 years ago. It all of a sudden sprung something and promptly died. We loved this camera so much with the 26x zoom and panoramic capabilities it was a no brainer to get another one. It took awesome pics on our trip to the grand canyon, Sedona etc grea
customer_reviews.author: A. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: We bought this camera for our 11 year old granddaughter ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this camera for our 11 year old granddaughter. She really enjoys using it. It is very user friendly and helpful to the first time picture taker. The only thing we cannot get it to do is to delete pictures from the card. Other than that it is an exceptional camera.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Sharon Walley

customer_reviews.title: The autofocus is poor in comparision to other models I've owned causing fuzzy ...
customer_reviews.text: There is no eyepiece and the LED screen is subject to severe glare making it hard to frame your shot. The autofocus is poor in comparision to other models I've owned causing fuzzy photos unless I use a tripod. It does have some functions such as the low light that works very well
customer_reviews.author: Maria L.

customer_reviews.title: Try it you'll like it!
customer_reviews.text: Who knew GE made a camera- I didn't! So glad I decided to try this camera. I have a Nikon but this is the go to camera. Crisp sharp pictures and ease of use. I highly recommend .
customer_reviews.author: Ginia

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad at all!
customer_reviews.text: I'd compare the look of this camera and the functions it offers to a cannon high end model. But...the color quality of the photos is a little off. But for the money..not bad
customer_reviews.author: Julie W.

customer_reviews.title: Pro
customer_reviews.text: I am an ex Navy photographer, and civilian photographer. I bought this camera based on features and price. I was not disappointed. Bought this camera for my pre-teen grand daughter and I must say it was been a great buy. If you don't need the inter-changeable lenses and the fancy names and the extra cost that come along with those things, this camera is a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great price and product.
customer_reviews.text: This book has traveled and has taken many photos and videos. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rina A Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I had to throw this camera into the trash because ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to throw this camera into the trash because it failed to turn on after two months of operation....I couldn't get it repaired and finally heaved it!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. Takes high quality photos. A must for every beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pictures!
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes exceptionally sharp colorful pictures! Very simple to use! I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: I love the camera and great photos for the price but ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the camera and great photos for the price but I would have like the battery to be rechargeable. I also did not care for the panoramic feature of taking 3 pictures then the camera stitch them together. For a beginner it is not that easy.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: I love mine, the only problem that I have with ...
customer_reviews.text: I love mine, the only problem that I have with it, is the memory card does not stay locked in unless I close that area where the batteries and the memory card stay at. I do think it is an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great camera.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as I expected it to be. Works great. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: L. Niswonger

customer_reviews.title: GE bridge camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect camera for my needs. I am currently taking a photography class and I am amazed what this camera can do.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Mrozik

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I expected. A decent camera with very good zoom. Screen is a bit grainy, and the weight is more than I thought, but I'm happy .
customer_reviews.author: Richard geer

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Was very I satisfied with picture results . Not very clear imaging unless with flash in no light
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice little camera. Great for travel and fun shots. About what I expected .
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera. Love the black and white picture mode. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Long

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: Real nice camera,It takes great picture, and a lot of buttons to play with. the only down side is that it has no eye piece (look through instead of using the screen) , so when u are outside in the sun light the screen is so dim it is hard to see what u are taking a picture of. That is why i gave a 3 star other wise i would have given 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

product_meta.title: GE X2600 16.1 MP Digital Camera 26x Zoom Wide Angle - Black
product_meta.description: GE X2600 Power Pro Series Bridge Digital Camera with 26X Optical Zoom, 26mm Wide Angle Lens, Optical Image Stabilization, 16MP sensor, 3" Auto Brightness LCD and advanced features including HD 720p video, HDMI Output, Panorama, Face Detection, Face Recognition, Red-Eye Removal. Power by AA Battery.
